title: Machine Learning
description: Invokes a machine learning model to make a prediction on a document during indexing.

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

modelId.title: Machine Learning Model ID
modelId.description: The ID of the ML model stored in the Fusion blob store. If you trained a model using a Fusion Job, by default the model ID will be the same as the job name.

docFeatureFieldName.title: Document Feature Field
docFeatureFieldName.description: Name of fields to feed into the model. Can be a single field name, or multiple field names are supported in this format: field1:weight,field2:weight,field3:weight

predictionFieldName.title: Prediction Field Name
predictionFieldName.description: Name of the field to store the prediction (model output) in the document.

defaultValue.title: Default Value
defaultValue.description: Value to provide if a prediction cannot be made

failOnError.title: Fail on Error
failOnError.description: Flag to indicate if this stage should throw an exception if an error occurs while generating a prediction for a document.

storeInContext.title: Store the Prediction in the Context
storeInContext.description: Flag to indicate that the prediction should be set as a context property instead of setting a field on the document.

includeRawPredictions.title: Include Raw Predictions and Scores
includeRawPredictions.description: Flag to indicate that raw predictions and scores, in addition to the best prediction, should be set on the document.
